name: deep-sea-scale
effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Defense. Evolves the holder into Gorebyss when traded.
short_effect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Defense. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Gorebyss.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises the SP. DEF of CLAMPERL.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises the SP. DEF of CLAMPERL.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A scale that shines a faint pink. It raises the SP. DEF stat.
